header.subtitle.message: Our solutions make familiarization possible for both own and hired equipment, and provide a collected overview of documented and certified competence.

general.readmore.description: The label used to link to the full article

general.contactus.title.message: Want to know more? Contact us
general.contactus.title.description: The label used to link to the contact page

home.banner.title1.description: The title of the home page

home.banner.title2.description: The title of the home page part two

home.safety.title.description: The title of the safety section on the home page

home.safety.what.message: DigiQuip is the hub that easily connects your machinery and equipment fleet with available documentation, inspection procedures, safety training, and specific machine and equipment training.
home.safety.what.description: The description of the safety section on the home page

home.safety.how.message: -So that the right people use the right machine in the right way.
home.safety.how.description: The how part of the description of the safety section on the home page

home.safeuse.title.message: Correct use of equipment depends on the necessary training and competence
home.safeuse.title.description: The title of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg1.message: DigiQuip is a technology company that simplifies the management of competence, training, and documentation. We offer unique solutions for conducting equipment-specific training, also known as type training or machine-specific training. In addition, our solutions can be used to keep track of courses, competence certificates, project experience, and education.
home.safeuse.arg1.description: The first argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg2.message: At the construction site? By scanning a QR code or another identifier, individuals receive instant confirmation of whether they have the appropriate and necessary documented training to use that specific machine, tool, or safety equipment. Reporting or completion of training can be done immediately. This ensures that the right people use the right equipment in the right way.
home.safeuse.arg2.description: The second argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg3.message: By placing QR codes on machines or equipment, users gain immediate access to their own competency status for the specific work equipment.
home.safeuse.arg3.description: The third argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.consolidate.title.message: Full control over equipment and documentation
home.consolidate.title.description: The title of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.arg1.message: Inspections, documents, and user manuals for equipment should always be easily accessible when needed. Why? This makes it easier to ensure that equipment is well-maintained and only used when it is safe to do so.
home.consolidate.arg1.description: The first argument of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.arg2.message: At the construction site? When a worker or inspector scans the equipment's identifier, they can find the latest inspection status, documents, and user manual. Additionally, a pre-use inspection can be quickly carried out and documented, either with or without a digital checklist.
home.consolidate.arg2.description: The second argument of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point1.message: Digital checklists for machines and equipment.
home.consolidate.point1.description: The first point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point2.message: Perform equipment inspections at the right time.
home.consolidate.point2.description: The second point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point3.description: The third point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.share.title.message: Suppliers efficiently share information and content
home.share.title.description: The title of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.point1.description: The first point of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.point2.description: The second point of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.share.point3.description: The third point of the share knowledge and experience section on the home page

home.expert.title.message: Efficient execution and documentation of expert inspections
home.expert.title.description: The title of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.arg1.message: With our solution, inspectors can efficiently carry out their work from planning to follow-up, including thorough documentation.
home.expert.arg1.description: The first argument of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.arg2.message: Machine owners also gain complete visibility into the status, inspection deadlines, and necessary documentation.
home.expert.arg2.description: The second argument of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point1.message: Streamline planning with a comprehensive machine overview.
home.expert.point1.description: The first point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point2.description: The second point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point3.message: Easily conduct and document annual inspections.
home.expert.point3.description: The third point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.ourpartners.title.description: The title of the our partners section on the home page

home.contact.title.message: Focused on the right use of equipment at the right time?
home.contact.title.description: The title of the contact section on the home page

home.contact.button.description: The button label of the contact section on the home page

competence.banner.title1.message: Kvipp is a super simple, and free, solution for
competence.banner.title1.description: The title of the competence page part one

competence.banner.title2.description: The title of the competence page part two

kvippbenefits.title1.description: The title of the first section on the Kvipp page

kvippbenefits.title2.description: The second title of the first section on the Kvipp page

kvippbenefits.arg1.message: With Kvipp, ensuring everyone has equipment-specific training is easier than ever. Say goodbye to complicated logins and registrations!
kvippbenefits.arg1.description: The first argument of the first Kvipp section

kvippbenefits.arg2.message: Kvipp can be used anytime, anywhere, with no preparation or commitment required.

kvippbenefits.arg3.message: All you need is a phone, internet access, and an HSE card (or driving licence).

kvipp-get-started.arg1.message: Kvipp is available whenever and wherever you need it, whether you're checking or completing training:

kvipp-get-started.point2.message: Scan the equipment's identifier (QR code/NFC tag) or use artificial intelligence to recognise the equipment

kvipp-get-started.point3.message: Identify the person using their HSE card or driving licence. Scan the QR code on the HSE card or take a picture of the driving licence and let artificial intelligence do the work

kvipp-situation.title1.message: Training in connection with renting equipment

kvipp-situation.arg1.message: An example of a situation where Kvipp simplifies training is when e.g. a company rents some equipment. With Kvipp, the rental company can provide training and ensure that documentation is stored digitally and with the right content immediately.

bedrift.banner.title1.message: Kvipp Bedrift gives you full control over training with minimal effort

bedrift.benefits.title2.message: you gain an overview of training.

bedrift.benefits.arg1.message: For just NOK 1390 per month (excl. VAT), the company gains an overview of all equipment-specific training and documentation - always available and up to date.

bedrift.benefits.point1.message: Your employees are automatically and securely added to the solution via the HSE card integration

bedrift.benefits.point2.message: Equipment and documentation are automatically added to the overview after training is completed

bedrift.benefits.point3.message: Overview and gap analyses in real time. Get a continuous overview of who has or lacks training

bedrift.groups.arg1.message: An overview of completed training is available in Kvipp Bedrift. If you use the HSE card, the person and training are automatically linked to the correct organisation.

bedrift.groups.point1.message: Check what training each person has, and download the relevant documentation

bedrift.groups.point2.message: Check who can use which work equipment

bedrift.groups.point3.message: Create groups with individuals and equipment, and gain an overview of status and progression. In the screenshot, you can see that individuals have training on half of the equipment in the group, and you will be able to drill down to more details.

workequipment.banner.title1.message: Get an overview of whether the equipment is safe to use
workequipment.banner.title1.description: The first title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.title2.description: The second title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.title3.description: The third title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.title4.message: Streamline internal processes by consolidating all work equipment in one place.
workequipment.banner.title4.description: The fourth title of the work equipment page

workequipment.banner.arg1.message: When a business manages many machines and equipment, it is important that documents, manuals, and reports are organised and readily available when people need them.
workequipment.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the work equipment banner

workequipment.banner.arg2.message: Most machines and equipment requires inspections, and this must happen in a timely manner. The inspection of work equipment can be streamlined using digital checklists with standard reporting. Digital checklists for machines and equipment make it easier to carry out and document everything from pre-use to annual inspections.
workequipment.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the work equipment banner

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Full control with the Maintenance module
workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The title of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: With the Maintenance module, you get full insight into the condition of your equipment fleet, both in the field and at the office.
workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The first argument of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page
The second argument of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Easily log maintenance through QR code with your mobile.

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Link maintenance tasks to custom checklists.
workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The second point of the systematized documentation section on the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Generate reports and gain a complete overview of your machinery fleet

workequipment.machines_equipment.arg1.message: With Trygg Maskin, operators quickly access everything they need for safe and efficient use via a QR code attached to the equipment

workequipment.machines_equipment.point2.description: The second point of the machine equipment section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machines_equipment.point3.message: View the status of expert controls to ensure everything is in order before use.
workequipment.machines_equipment.point3.description: The third point of the machine equipment section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machineinsights.title.description: The first title of the machine Insights section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machineinsights.title2.description: The second title of the machine Insights section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machineinsights.arg1.message: The expert control module makes it easy to perform both expert inspections and other controls for your equipment fleet.
workequipment.machineinsights.arg1.description: The first argument of the machine Insights section in the work equipment page

workequipment.machineinsights.point1.message: Give inspectors access to start expert control through QR code on the equipment.
workequipment.machineinsights.point1.description: The first point of the machine Insights section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machineinsights.point2.message: Document deviations with photos and descriptions.
workequipment.machineinsights.point2.description: The second point of the machine Insights section on the work equipment page

workequipment.machineinsights.point3.message: Keep track of inspection documents and inspection status, available to both inspectors and equipment users.

aboutus.banner.title1.description: The title of banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.title2.message: Through years of building a rental business, Lars saw a clear need to improve safety for customers.
aboutus.banner.title2.description: The second title of banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg1.message: Incorrect use of equipment is potentially very risky and can lead to serious injuries, or, in worst case, even death. The lack of easily accessible and structured product information, as well as limited collaboration in the industry, held back improvement in safety.
aboutus.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg2.message: The need was clear – to offer the industry a solution that centralizes content for rental companies and businesses, in cooperation with dealers and OEMs, and make this information easily accessible to equipment users.
aboutus.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg3.description: The third argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.contact.title.message: DigiQuip helps you solve equipment training, machine inspections and in general to get the control you need

home.event.description.message: Do you want to ensure a better customer experience with the use of customer data, also on the website? In this webinar, we take you through how to collect and utilize customer data in the best possible way, so that customers keep coming back to you.

navbar.label.contact_us.description: Navbar item with label Contact Us

navbar.label.book_meeting.description: Navbar item with label Book a Meeting

home.news.news1desc.message: All employees must receive training on the type of work equipment they will be using. This is about ensuring health, safety, environmental protection and profitability. In Kvipp, training can be easily completed and documented digitally anytime - for free! You only need a phone and an HSE card (or other ID), with no preparation or follow-up work required.

home.news.news2title.message: Lack of documentation led to a work stoppage

home.news.news2desc.message: We needed to easily manage equipment-specific training! Both safety and efficiency are crucial in the construction industry. Systems that ensure workers have the necessary training and documentation are essential. Challenges related to equipment-specific training often lead to delays on construction sites across Norway. The Kvipp digital platform solves these challenges in an efficient and user-friendly way.
